name: wizard
title: Wizard
description: A step by step wizard style navigation with progress monitoring.

options.name: current-index
options.description: Use this option on <vs-wizard> to control active step.

options.name: disable-previous
options.description: This option can be handy on the last step if you don't want users to go back to previous step, i.e. after payment.

options.name: icon
options.description: Sets svg icon on the <vs-wizard-step> element. This component uses vuestrap-icons. If no icon is specified, wizard will auto fall back to numbers.

options.name: progress
options.description: Sets progress bar on the <vs-wizard-step> element. Pass a value from 0 to 100 to show a progress within each step.

options.name: valid
options.description: Sets valid state on the <vs-wizard-step> element. When set to true, progress will be forced to 100, and next step will become clickable.
